    B

    buy(StockData[], String, int) - Static method in class simulation.InvestmentSimulator
    Attempts to buy a specified amount of shares of a stock in standard simulation mode.
    BUYING_SCREEN - Variable in class ui.DrawingSurface
     
    BuyingScreen - Class in ui
    The BuyingScreen class represents the interactive UI screen where users can input an amount of shares to buy in the simulation.
    BuyingScreen(DrawingSurface) - Constructor for class ui.BuyingScreen
    Constructs a new BuyingScreen with the given drawing surface.
    buyStock(String, double, int) - Method in class simulation.Simulator
    Buys a specified number of shares of a stock if there is enough balance.
